summary.body: In 2005, the Barbican blocks were upgraded for digital TV.  Except my flat, as for various reasons at the time I did not respond to the letter. (Maybe I am not the only  one). Now I have to arrange the installation of the digital IRS connection myself. Has anyone else done this and could recommend an installer?
summary.subject: Connection to digital TV network

summary.body: That's television, rather than transvestite by the way.  Anyone know a decent technician who would install and set up a new dvd to my telly. I know this must sound feeble to all of you who know what you are talking about on the massive posting about our new television system, but my expertise lies in other directions.
summary.subject: TV technician
